Remote: 1b - Retrieve machines in network and ping and nmap and save list

Local: 5a - Set expiration date for all users in specific OU
6a - Get rid of expiration date for specific users
7a - Set email address for all users
100ab(CCDC) - Diable PS Remoting on all machines across domain
108a(CCDC) - Add no password expire user for ldap binding (only do once)
